Open Data Open Data By using this App you accept scanned bar codes and location data to be copied and sent to AoenLabs Open Data Database too.
About AeonLabs Solutions Check AeonLabs\'s website for more Android solutions for IoT. www.aeonlabs.solutions

Scan your first Barcode or QR Code to see the information here.] Camera Permission Granted. Camera permission is required for Barcode Scanning. Sorry , We are not able to scan Barcode without your permission. Home Screen Next Skip Back Got It Manual entry use QR code
Welcome!
AeonLabs barcode scanner allows anyone to scan a barcode or a QR code, google it, share with others and save on a local database on this device .
Anonymous Data, Always!
As part of AeonLAbs free services, you allow anonymous data to be sent to AeonLabs\'s Open Data access Database. ONLY the barcode code, latitude and longitude values are sent no other data is sent. This anonymized open data will help businesses and industries with anonymous data analytics. Anonymous data you are accessing when using open data services and products.
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
Play Again
Type the Server web address without the final / Cloud Server API Url Are you sure you want to add Connect to the Cloud Server API where the barcodes will be sent. You need to type a valid url web address Connect to the Cloud Server API where the barcodes will be sent. You need a valid QR code with The cloud server API web address.
